issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: TiAPI
components.description: This component is used for cross-platform API work. Specifications are most likely to use this component.

fields.description:
On Android, Ti.Filesystem.File.parent is a property of type File, so getParent returns a File object.

On iOS, there's no parent property, but there is a getParent method, which returns the parent's path, as a String.
fields.summary: Ti API: Ti.Filesystem.File.getParent returns incompatible types in iOS, Android

comments.body: Closing ticket due to the time passed and lack of progress.
